content: Lisimachos P. Kondi Lisimachos P. Kondi Professor, Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering, University of Ioannina Home Courses Publications Lisimachos P. Kondi I am a Professor at the University of Ioannina in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering. My research interests are in the general areas of signal processing and communications, including image/video compression and transmission over wireless channels and the Internet, video quality assessment, sparse representations and compressive sensing, wireless communications, super-resolution of video sequences, image watermarking, and shape coding. EDUCATION Diploma, Electrical Engineering, Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, Greece, 1994 M.S., Electrical and Computer Engineering, Northwestern University, USA, 1996 Ph.D., Electrical and Computer Engineering, Northwestern University, USA, 1999 Contact Information Lisimachos P.
